summary: AN ORDINANCE requiring posting and disclosure of certain information related to income tax refund anticipation loans, refund anticipation checks, and similar refund-related bank products; prohibiting certain practices related to income tax refund anticipation loans, refund anticipation checks, and other similar refund-related bank products; adding a new chapter to Title 7 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and amending Chapter 3.02 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
